آرسنل نے 1989 اور 2005 کے درمیان چار لیگ: How many league titles did Arsenal win between 1989 and 2005? Arsenal league titles 1989 to 2005

Between 1989 and 2005, they won five league titles and five FA Cups, including two more doubles. They completed the 20th century with the highest average league position. Between 1998 and 2017, Arsenal qualified for the UEFA Champions League for an English football record nineteen consecutive seasons.
